events.description: Kyle Schwarber singles on a ground ball to right fielder Avisail Garcia, deflected by second baseman Luis Arraez.
Alec Bohm singles on a ground ball to right fielder Avisail Garcia. Kyle Schwarber to 2nd.

Marlins challenged (tag play), call on the field was upheld: Luis Arraez doubles (25) on a line drive to right fielder Nick Castellanos. Jacob Stallings out at home on the throw, right fielder Nick Castellanos to second baseman Bryson Stott to catcher Garrett Stubbs. Luis Arraez to 3rd. 1 out
